title: Do college students know the student who is their college mascot? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s going to depend a lot on the size of the college in question. When I went to FSU, it had around 20,000 undergraduate students, and more than 10,000 graduate students attending. With that many people, there’s no way for anyone to know more than a small fraction of the other students personally, so most people didn’t know who the mascot was. I know I definitely didn’t.

I’m not sure. We cannot assume that everybody knows. But I know a good chunk of people at a four year college would know. I don’t think everybody at my cc knows, although I now who the college mascot is.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by James Daniel Garza
